title: A Hard Day's Night
plotSummary: Meredith begins her journey at Seattle Grace, meeting fellow interns and performing her first surgery.

title: Bring the Pain
plotSummary: Meredith delivers a heartfelt ultimatum to Derek: 'Pick me, choose me, love me.'

title: Now or Never
plotSummary: The interns discover George's shocking identity as a John Doe patient after his heroic sacrifice.

title: Death and All His Friends
plotSummary: A shooter terrorizes the hospital, leaving Meredith devastated by Derek's critical condition.

title: Flight
plotSummary: A plane crash leaves the doctors stranded, with Lexie's death marking a heartbreaking moment.

title: How to Save a Life
plotSummary: Derek Shepherd dies after a tragic car accident, leaving fans in shock and Meredith a widow.

title: Losing My Religion
plotSummary: Denny Duquette dies after Izzie's desperate attempt to save him, leaving the team grieving.

title: Didn't We Almost Have It All?
plotSummary: Cristina's wedding to Burke falls apart as she realizes she cannot go through with it.

title: Fear (of the Unknown)
plotSummary: Cristina bids an emotional farewell as she leaves for Zurich, ending an iconic chapter.

title: Silent All These Years
plotSummary: Jo helps a sexual assault survivor, with the staff lining the hallways in a powerful display of support.
